com.emc.atmos.api.jersey

Class MeasuredInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.emc.atmos.api.jersey.MeasuredInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MeasuredInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    A simple delegating class to attach a size to an input stream. This class does not perform any calculation and merely stores/returns the size specified in the constructor.
